about.label: About Me
about.title: Creative problem solver
about.description1: Results-driven Digital Marketing & Creative Specialist with expertise in website management, SEO, Google Ads, social media marketing, photography, and videography.
about.description2: Skilled in developing, executing, and analyzing data-driven marketing strategies that increase brand visibility and drive measurable results. Experienced in managing multiple brands such as @corechamps, @musclerulz, @prosciencenutra and @jnknutrition, handling full digital operations from content design and video production to ad campaign optimization and web maintenance.

optimized.label: Performance First
optimized.title: Optimized for results
optimized.description: Designed with a focus on performance, our services employ data-driven strategies, continuous optimization, and advanced analytics to ensure measurable growth and maximum ROI.

extensibility.title: Extensibility
extensibility.description: With a strong emphasis on extensibility, our services offer a flexible framework that allows seamless integration with your existing tools and workflows. Whether you're using Shopify, WordPress, or custom platforms, we ensure compatibility and smooth operations.

options.title: Infinite options
options.description: With an array of infinite options, our services provide unparalleled flexibility and choice, ensuring we can tailor solutions to your unique business needs. From startups to enterprises, we adapt to your scale and requirements.

security.title: Security & Reliability
security.description: Your business data and digital assets are protected with industry-standard security measures. We implement robust protocols, regular backups, and monitoring to ensure your operations run smoothly without interruption.

journey.label: Journey
journey.title: Curiosity, responsibility, and a lot of late nights.
journey.subtitle: From a village photo studio in 2012 to building brands and products in Dubai.

curiosity.title: Act I ‚Äî Curiosity
curiosity.line1: 6th grade in a village; my uncle's Dubai laptop felt like a portal.
curiosity.line2: I learned Photoshop in the photo studio, fixing family shots and making random edits.
curiosity.line3: Posted a playful Facebook frame that hit 2M+ uses‚Äîfirst taste of reach.

responsibility.title: Act II ‚Äî Responsibility
responsibility.line1: Dropped my diploma to earn for family‚Äîresponsibility over the safe track.
responsibility.line2: Built a tiny marketing + merch shop; it struggled and shut down.
responsibility.line3: Tried a restaurant; Covid wiped it out. Debt and pressure, still learning design/marketing at night.

focus.title: Act III ‚Äî Dubai & Focus
focus.line1: Sold the family cow to reach Dubai; first job paid little, lessons were huge.
focus.line2: Moved from social to performance marketing, then web/app builds with AI tools.
focus.line3: Now a hybrid creative‚Äîbrand, growth, and product in one. Looking for teams that care about outcomes over titles.

y2012.title: First laptop & village studio
y2012.description: Uncle's Dubai laptop and the photo studio PC became my first lab.

y2015.title: Viral Facebook frame (2M+)
y2015.description: Uploaded a fun frame; 2M+ uses proved the work could travel.

y2018.title: Local marketing agency + merch
y2018.description: Ran a tiny shop selling designs and prints; learned sales and failure up close.

y2020.title: Restaurant, Covid, debt
y2020.description: Locked down and shut; crawled out of debt while still studying at night.

y2022.title: Moved to Dubai, first job
y2022.description: Sold the family cow, took low pay for steep learning and exposure.

y2023.title: Performance marketing ‚Üí product builds
y2023.description: Shifted from ads to funnels, sites, and flows‚Äîlayering in AI assistance.

y2024.title: Hybrid creative, AI-powered projects
y2024.description: Building brands, growth systems, and AI workflows together.

takeaways.title: What this means for you
takeaways.bullet1: I care about results, not certificates.
takeaways.bullet2: Calm under pressure, allergic to toxic environments.
takeaways.bullet3: Creative + marketing + tech in one person.
